title: Hextech repair Tool show wrong directory
body:
Tool shows error: "insufficient privileges to access this directory D:\Riot Games" 
Problem is, i dont even have Lol on D:\  (Not even Riot Games catalog), i have game (also PBE) on C:\
What can i do?

replies.body: Did you possibly download the HRT to the D:\ directory? Make sure you're downloading that tool to the same place as League, and if that's not the problem try redownloading the tool as admin.
